title: :: Veterans ' mutations from Koma after 69 years
subtitle: Rumours: One of the veterans was injured during the Battle of Ew Gemma in 1945 and finally emerged from his coma after 69 years.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A veteran soldier was wounded during the Battle of Ew Gemma in 1945 and finally emerged from his coma after 69 years.
